title: Typeform
shortDescription: Make conversational forms and surveys. Get more data. Boom.
longDescription:
##About Typeform lets you collect data in a conversational way. Traditional forms and surveys never looked this good. Do research, collect feedback, generate leads â€” all through a beautiful interface. What you ask matters â€” how you ask is everything.
##Easy to build Making typeforms is as easy as answering them. Our builder allows you to add images, icons, GIFS, and video to make every question stand out. Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
#Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
##Works great everywhere From smartphones to tablets to laptops â€” weâ€™ve got you covered. Forget about those pesky compatibility issues once and for all.
##Explore your data Get insightful metrics and generate reports that look as great as your typeforms. Export your data for further analysis.
##Typeform for developers Generate beautiful typeforms dynamically and send any data you collect to your favorite web apps with our Data API.
##Collaborate with ease Integrate Typeform into your organization. Team up on projects and share your responses all from one place.
##A place for everything Group typeforms into separate workspaces to manage all your projects. Have a workspace for every team â€” think marketing, HR, or product.
instructions: ### **3 steps to data collection heaven** 1. **Create your Typeform account** if you don't have one 2. Make a kick-ass typeform (we have templates to guide you) 3. Integrate with your Cloudflare website
author: Typeform

categories.title: Grow Your Email List
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your email subscribers.

categories.title: Get More Customers
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your customer base.

categories.title: Add-ons
categories.description: Drop-in components to add to your website.

categories.title: For Developers
categories.description: Apps made for web developers and designers.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

categories.title: E-Commerce
categories.description: Tools to help your online business.

proposedApp.title: Typeform
proposedApp.shortDescription: Make conversational forms and surveys. Get more data. Boom.
proposedApp.longDescription:
##About Typeform lets you collect data in a conversational way. Traditional forms and surveys never looked this good. Do research, collect feedback, generate leads â€” all through a beautiful interface. What you ask matters â€” how you ask is everything.
##Easy to build Making typeforms is as easy as answering them. Our builder allows you to add images, icons, GIFS, and video to make every question stand out. Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
#Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
##Works great everywhere From smartphones to tablets to laptops â€” weâ€™ve got you covered. Forget about those pesky compatibility issues once and for all.
##Explore your data Get insightful metrics and generate reports that look as great as your typeforms. Export your data for further analysis.

##Collaborate with ease Integrate Typeform into your organization. Team up on projects and share your responses all from one place.

proposedApp.instructions:
# 3 steps to data collection heaven
1. Create your Typeform account 2. Make a kick-ass typeform (we have templates to guide you) 3. Integrate with your Cloudflare account 4. VoilÃ  - life is beautiful (while not an actual step, it's still important to acknowledge)

products.title: Free
products.longDescription:
The essentials for getting better answers online.

  - 10 fields per typeform
  - Basic question types
  - Metrics & Reporting
  - Self-notifications (email)
  - Answer piping
  - Send data to 500+ apps (Zapier)
  - Data API
  - Embedding

products.title: Pro
products.longDescription:
Customize endings, send email notifications, branch or skip questions.

- Unlimited typeform fields
- Advanced question types
- Metrics & Reporting
- Self-notifications (email)
- Answer piping
- Send data to 500+ apps (Zapier)
- Data API
- Embedding
- Conditional logic (logic jump)
- Respondent notifications (email)
- Calculator (scoring & pricing)
- Custom Thank you screen
- Hidden fields
- Payment field
- File upload field (2Gb storage)

products.title: Pro+
products.longDescription:
Remove Typeform branding, invite team members, redirect respondents, and more...
- Unlimited typeform fields
- Advanced question types
- Metrics & Reporting
- Self-notifications (email)
- Answer piping
- Send data to 500+ apps (Zapier)
- Data API
- Embedding
- Conditional logic (logic jump)
- Respondent notifications (email)
- Calculator (scoring & pricing)
- Custom Thank you screen
- Hidden fields
- Payment field
- File upload field (4Gb/user)
- Invite other users to workspaces
- Account Manager (for 10+ users)
- Priority support
- Remove Typeform branding
- Redirect upon submit
- Webhooks
- Close after submit

- Unlimited typeform fields
- Advanced question types
- Metrics & Reporting
- Self-notifications (email)
- Answer piping
- Send data to 500+ apps (Zapier)
- Data API
- Embedding
- Conditional logic (logic jump)
- Respondent notifications (email)
- Calculator (scoring & pricing)
- Custom Thank you screen
- Hidden fields
- Payment field
- File upload field (4Gb/user)
- Invite other users to workspaces
- Account Manager (for 10+ users)
- Priority support
- Remove Typeform branding
- Redirect upon submit
- Webhooks
- Close after submit

Turn off the background, footer and header so your typeform fits seamlessly into your site

type.title: How should this typeform appear on your site?

failure.message: There was an error communicating with Typeform.

proposedApp.title: Typeform
proposedApp.shortDescription: Make conversational forms and surveys. Get more data. Boom.
proposedApp.longDescription:
##About Typeform lets you collect data in a conversational way. Traditional forms and surveys never looked this good. Do research, collect feedback, generate leads â€” all through a beautiful interface. What you ask matters â€” how you ask is everything.
##Easy to build Making typeforms is as easy as answering them. Our builder allows you to add images, icons, GIFS, and video to make every question stand out. Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
#Get custom notifications Set up custom emails for you & your respondents. Add a personal touch to keep the conversation going on your favorite channels.
##Works great everywhere From smartphones to tablets to laptops â€” weâ€™ve got you covered. Forget about those pesky compatibility issues once and for all.
##Explore your data Get insightful metrics and generate reports that look as great as your typeforms. Export your data for further analysis.
##Typeform for developers Generate beautiful typeforms dynamically and send any data you collect to your favorite web apps with our Data API.
##Collaborate with ease Integrate Typeform into your organization. Team up on projects and share your responses all from one place.
##A place for everything Group typeforms into separate workspaces to manage all your projects. Have a workspace for every team â€” think marketing, HR, or product.
proposedApp.instructions: ### **3 steps to data collection heaven** 1. **Create your Typeform account** if you don't have one 2. Make a kick-ass typeform (we have templates to guide you) 3. Integrate with your Cloudflare website
proposedApp.author: Typeform
